name: Mortal Decay
description:
It is post world war 3, you are starving, just trying to find food.
With your strength slowly fading, you make way into an abandon prison.
Hopelessly you search for some food stored inside.
During your hunt, you find out the prison is not as abandon as you thought it was...

Survive
You are being chased, your pursuers motives unknown.
Discover the past of the prison and the reason your enemies chase you.

» Immersive and horrifying story
» Multiple enemies with unique AI

Can you survive?
